tags.name: pdf-browser-viewer
tags.description:
Example:
```html
<pdf-browser-viewer id="pdfViewer" file="[[pdfUrl]]" width="100%"></pdf-browser-viewer>
```

Data Bind with Blob example:
```js
this.pdfUrl = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
```

Clear PDF container example:
```js
this.shadowRoot.querySelector('#pdfViewer').clear();
```

Message example:
```html
<pdf-browser-viewer
  file="[[pdfUrl]]"
  not-supported-message="Not supported by your browser"
  not-supported-link-message="see the file here!">
</pdf-browser-viewer>
```

Card example:
```html
<pdf-browser-viewer
  file="[[pdfUrl]]"
  card elevation="3"
  download-label="Baixar">
</pdf-browser-viewer>
```

attributes.name: file
attributes.description: The location of the PDF file.

attributes.name: not-supported-message
attributes.description: The message when browser doesn't support pdf object
attributes.default: "It appears your Web browser is not configured to display PDF files. No worries, just"

attributes.name: not-supported-link-message
attributes.description: The PDF link message when browser doesn't support pdf object
attributes.default: "click here to download the PDF file."

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: The height of the PDF viewer.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The width of the PDF viewer.

attributes.name: card
attributes.description: PDF viewer as a card with download button.

attributes.name: download-label
attributes.description: Download button label.

attributes.name: elevation
attributes.description: The z-depth of the card, from 0-5.

properties.name: file
properties.description: The location of the PDF file.

properties.name: notSupportedMessage
properties.description: The message when browser doesn't support pdf object
properties.default: "It appears your Web browser is not configured to display PDF files. No worries, just"

properties.name: notSupportedLinkMessage
properties.description: The PDF link message when browser doesn't support pdf object
properties.default: "click here to download the PDF file."

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the PDF viewer.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the PDF viewer.

properties.name: card
properties.description: PDF viewer as a card with download button.

properties.name: downloadLabel
properties.description: Download button label.

properties.name: elevation
properties.description: The z-depth of the card, from 0-5.
